title: My Updated Profile Background Looks So Beautiful ❤

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

replies.body: Except in the lower right corner it says Bronze 5 NEGATIVE 76 LP WHAT THE HELL? Also you are honour level ZERO? So you are toxic AND shit at the game?

I got a chat ban, and then new Eve came out, so I reformed.

And I am trying *SO* hard to get out of Bronze V, especially since this is my second season. I've been getting coaching all year, and the last coach I had (yesterday) said that I was absolute garbage and should just quit playing LoL...

I doubt I'd get Silver, but my goal is at least Bronze IV :D
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
If a coach, someone who's job is to teach players and help them get better, is telling you that you should stop playing the game, maybe it's a sign...
A sign of what? That they're a bad coach? I kind of already figured that out...
Hahahahaha, you are actually hilarious. Good luck getting BACK to 0LP

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=1d9ETP5V,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-11T12:39:51.250+0000)
>
> Hahahahaha, you are actually hilarious. Good luck getting BACK to 0LP

I almost died from this whole thread.
how the hell do you get -76 lp LOL
Because I won a game at -100 LP, and earned 24 LP

> [{quoted}](name=Little Witch Eve,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=1d9ETP5V,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-10-11T05:18:31.748+0000)
>
> Because I won a game at -100 LP, and earned 24 LP

Stop dodging.
Isn't it better to lose 3 LP and no MMR when I end up being unable to play the only champ I can play, than to play and lose a lot more LP and also get my MMR lowered?

> [{quoted}](name=Little Witch Eve,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=1d9ETP5V,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-11T06:02:33.034+0000)
>
> Isn't it better to lose 3 LP and no MMR when I end up being unable to play the only champ I can play, than to play and lose a lot more LP and also get my MMR lowered?

I'm an Annie one-trick, but I still play other champs. I refuse to dodge. It's really bad for your MMR.

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=1d9ETP5V,comment-id=00020000000000000001,timestamp=2017-10-11T13:24:21.346+0000)
>
> I'm an Annie one-trick, but I still play other champs. I refuse to dodge. It's really bad for your MMR.

And I'm a Rakan one trick now. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Dodging has no effect on your MMR

Dodging is not meant to be something that you abuse, not only are you frustrating multiple lobbies of players because of your stubborn tendency to only play a single champion, but you are just ruining it for yourself. -100LP Bronze 5 is actually ridiculous, I wouldn't even think something like that would be possible. Either stop playing ranked altogether or LEARN OTHER CHAMPIONS, for other players and for your own good.

I am learning something new :)

Eve got reworked, after all.
